QAPair.Question: What is (are) Liver disease - resources ?
QAPair.Answer: The following organizations are good resources for information on liver disease : American Liver Foundation -- liverfoundation.org , Centers for Disease Control and Prevention -- www.cdc.gov/hepatitis , Children's Liver Association for Support Services (C.L.A.S.S.) -- www.classkids.org/ , National Institute of Diabetes and Digestive and Kidney Diseases -- www.niddk.nih.gov/health-information/liver-disease , US National Library of Medicine, MedlinePlus -- medlineplus.gov/liverdiseases.html ,
